item.description:
Meeting is at my house which is the Idle Dog in Maynard. the Idle Dog's application for special permit will be decided on 1/14/09. If granted, this meetup will be a celebration. If denied, we will probably be planning our next move. Exciting? Come see what happens.

***The results of the public hearing were better than expected. Come hear about the exciting details!! This is absolutely a celebration.***

Deb
item.how_to_find_us: For directions, see my website: www.theidledog.com

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs January Meetup
